function.name: XSColor_GetHSL

abstract.p: Gets the HSL component values of a color object

desc.p: A pointer to the hue component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the saturation component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the luminance component value (may be NULL)

function.declaration: XS_EXPORT void XSColor_GetHSL( XSColorRef object, XSFloat *h, XSFloat *s, XSFloat *l );

function.name: XSColor_GetHSLA

abstract.p: Gets the HSLA component values of a color object

desc.p: A pointer to the hue component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the saturation component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the luminance component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the alpha component value (may be NULL)

function.declaration: XS_EXPORT void XSColor_GetHSLA( XSColorRef object, XSFloat *h, XSFloat *s, XSFloat *l, XSFloat *a );

function.name: XSColor_GetHSV

abstract.p: Gets the HSV component values of a color object

desc.p: A pointer to the hue component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the saturation component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the value component value (may be NULL)

function.declaration: XS_EXPORT void XSColor_GetHSV( XSColorRef object, XSFloat *h, XSFloat *s, XSFloat *v );

abstract.p: Gets the HSVA component values of a color object

desc.p: A pointer to the hue component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the saturation component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the value component value (may be NULL)
A pointer to the alpha component value (may be NULL)

function.declaration: XS_EXPORT void XSColor_GetHSVA( XSColorRef object, XSFloat *h, XSFloat *s, XSFloat *v, XSFloat *a );
